item.title: By: Sarah Cosper
item.dc:creator: Sarah Cosper
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/first-beauty-memories/#comment-20">Samantha smith</a>.
Oh yeah! That's totally a thing moms used to do!
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Samantha smith.

Oh yeah! That’s totally a thing moms used to do!

item.title: By: Samantha smith
item.dc:creator: Samantha smith
item.description: My first beauty memory is so strange .I remember watching my mother use the same tube of lipstick as eyeshadow , blush, and lipstick . Crazy !
item.content:encoded: My first beauty memory is so strange .I remember watching my mother use the same tube of lipstick as eyeshadow , blush, and lipstick . Crazy !

item.title: By: Sarah Cosper
item.dc:creator: Sarah Cosper
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/first-beauty-memories/#comment-17">Lace</a>.
I love that you weren't dressed for CHRISTMAS EVE CHURCH without body glitter!!! HAHAHAHAHA! A+! Great story! Thanks for sharing!
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Lace.

I love that you weren’t dressed for CHRISTMAS EVE CHURCH without body glitter!!! HAHAHAHAHA! A+! Great story! Thanks for sharing!

item.title: By: Lace
item.dc:creator: Lace
item.description: Speaking of gold glitter I have a memory I was just talking to my sister about, in 6th grade I used to wear body glitter like it was my skin couldn't live without it and one Christmas Eve night we were all dressed up ready for church I just had to add my finishing touch (the roll on glitter) and sure as shit I was out! Ahh so in a hurry and a panic I grabbed my wet n wild glitter nail polish and painted my eyelids! Lol big mistake it dropped into my eyes burned like hell just a big mess I don't recommend that to anyone :)
item.content:encoded: Speaking of gold glitter I have a memory I was just talking to my sister about, in 6th grade I used to wear body glitter like it was my skin couldn’t live without it and one Christmas Eve night we were all dressed up ready for church I just had to add my finishing touch (the roll on glitter) and sure as shit I was out! Ahh so in a hurry and a panic I grabbed my wet n wild glitter nail polish and painted my eyelids! Lol big mistake it dropped into my eyes burned like hell just a big mess I don’t recommend that to anyone ðŸ™‚
